ModMetadata.Name: SOGS
ModMetadata.Author: LizeLive
ModMetadata.Description:
WARNING: This mod will not work, unless you install Stationeers.Addon mod loader. Read how to install it here: https://github.com/Erdroy/Stationeers.Addons ---
makes physics more realistic. - 2 H2 + O2 = 2 H2O - Lava Is Hot (geothermal) - nuclear batteries are radioactive (and self recharge)
